programmer.title: As a Programmer
programmer.description: I would write codes all day long, I like to learn more about new technologies and I think problem solving is my strength in this area.

employee.title: As an Employee
employee.description: I like to collaborate with my colleagues and I easily adapt to the challenges.

hobbies.title: My hobbies
hobbies.description: I like to swim and practice water sports, but at the same time I love hiking and spending time in nature.

future.title: My Perspective
future.description: I want to specialize in Web Development because it is a field in which I can constantly develop and challenge myself.

1.name: Adrian Moldovan
1.quotes: I definitely recommend Adnan as a developer... structured thinking, analytical thinking and the ability to long-term focusing.

2.name: Razvan Timis
2.quotes: I was Adnan's mentor for a month...I can say that he is a persevering person who has done all the tasks... Of course I recommend him as a javascript developer

3.name: Stefan Radusi
3.quotes: I was Adnan's mentor...  I discovered that Adnan has a very strong drive for learning new technologies as well as the discipline to implement them...
